page.title: 06 THE PIG FARM
page.content: {CALDECOTE,SMALL {VILLAGE,CAMBRIDGESHIRE GRAFTON PIG FARM THE PIG FARM IS QUITE BIG.IT IS IN TWO PARTS.THE BREEDING,MATERNITY AND EARLY REARING UNIT IS AT THE SOUTH END OF HIGHFIELDS;THE FATTENING UNIT IS AT THE NORTH END.SOMETIMES THE SMELL OF PIGS COVERS THE VILLAGE. THE OWNER IS MR THOMAS;BARRY FLETCHER IS HIS PARTNER.THERE ARE FIVE OTHER WORKERS,PLUS TWO MORE FOR WEEKEND WORK. THERE ARE 4000 PIGS,OF THE LANDRACE BREED.THE PIGS ARE TRANSPORTED FOR SLAUGHTERING AT FACTORIES ABOUT 30 MILES AWAY. MR THOMAS STARTED ABOUT 30 YEARS AGO WITH SIX PIGS.
